actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Desert Pupfish National Monument in the States of California and Nevada.

summary.text: Authorizes the establishment of the Desert Pupfish National Monument in the States of California and Nevada. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Desert Pupfish National Monument in the States of California and Nevada.
